title: Ticket #2005: Review/update condor_status/condor_q default reports
description:
The report formats from condor_status and condor_q are pretty old, frequently based on very old assumptions about the largest values that might be displayed. As modern systems get more powerful, the assumptions are increasingly violated and the resulting reports get jaggy and ugly. All of the reports should be review (possible STUDENTTASK). Specific items:

  • "condor_status" the Mem column can handle 4 digits. When you get machines with > 9.9GB of RAM, it looks pretty bad. Proposal: In the report show in GB?
